body:
Comment 2: 
Sorry, forgot the usual information:

I'm using tip on a 64-bit Linux box, and running GOARCH=386 go run mem.go on the given
source file.

I also have the problem on a old RHEL4, 64-bit box where mmap doesn't manage to map at
the fixed address and the allocator falls back to 32-bit mode.
